question: Is pRETRO-SUPER an adenoviral vector?
ideal_answer: No, pRETRO-SUPER is a retroviral vector.

snippets.text: In this study, we investigated the effect of small interfering RNA (siRNA) of connective tissue growth factor (CTGF) by pRetro-Super (PRS) retrovirus vector on the expression of CTGF and related extracellular matrix molecules in human renal proximal tubular cells (HKCs) induced by high glucose, to provide help for renal tubulointerstitial fibrosis therapy.
